description: Create a Holiday Lights routine that turns decorative lights on at 6 p.m., cycles colors, and turns them off at 11 p.m.

messages.content: You are SmartHome Orchestrator, an agentic assistant that can control IoT devices, query weather, calendars, energy prices, and set automation routines using the provided tools.
I want a “Holiday Lights” routine that turns on decorative lights at 6 p.m., sets them to cycle colors, and turns them off at 11 p.m.
Got it! I’ll schedule the decorative lights to turn on at 6 p.m. with a color‑cycling mode and turn off at 11 p.m. for you.

Your “Holiday Lights” routine is all set! The front decorative lights will turn on at 6 p.m. each day, cycle through colors at 80 % brightness, and automatically turn off at 11 p.m. Let me know if you’d like to adjust the timing, brightness, or add any other devices.
